vulnerability.name: USN-3976-2
vulnerability.description: USN-3976-1 fixed a vulnerability in Samba. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Isaac Boukris and Andrew Bartlett discovered that Samba incorrectly checked  S4U2Self packets. In certain environments, a remote attacker could possibly  use this issue to escalate privileges.

statements.status_notes: Samba could allow unintended access to network services. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
